text:
THE OHIO STATE UNIVERSITY
TELECOMMUNICATIONS CENTER WOSU TELEVISION
Richard B. Hull, Executive Director 2470 North Star Road
Columbus 21, Ohio
June 8, 1962
Mr, William G. Harley
President, NAEB
131*6 Connecticut Ave., N,W,
Washington 6, D.C,
Dear Bills
Thanks for your note of June 1st, By now you have received a copy of my
letter to Gunn which I read over the phone and altered somewhat as per our
discussion, I believe your letter should be distributed to one and all.
It is admirable, particularly the clarification of the Stone misconception.
Am waiting for the blast out of the N0rth Central region but have not seen
it yet. You may tentatively expect me on the 12th and the 19th in Washing¬
ton. I will formalize on Monday next. Give me any background dope on
Pace which you think will be useful.
Regards.
Sincerely,
Richard B. Hull
RBHsrc
received
NAEB HEADQUARTERS
JUN 11 1962
